```{webr}
library(ggplot2)
theme_set(theme_bw())
library(patchwork)
library(broom)

data(trees)
trees$Diam <- trees$Girth / 12
trees$Girth <- NULL
names(trees)
```

```{webr}
gg_height <- ggplot(data = trees, aes(x = Height, y = Volume)) +
    geom_point() +
    geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ poly(x, 2))

gg_diam <- ggplot(data = trees, aes(x = Diam, y = Volume)) +
    geom_point() +
    geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ poly(x, 2))

gg_height + gg_diam
```


Change to code below to fit your own model!

```{webr}
tree_lm <- lm(Volume ~ Diam + Height, data = trees)

tidy(tree_lm)

par(mfrow = c(2, 2))
plot(tree_lm)
```
